root.name: S.T.A.L.K.E.R. - Shadow of Chernobyl
root.description: Join a group of mercenaries, poachers, and thieves as they enter the previously quarantined Chernobyl area in search of artifacts and valuable formations. Known as S.T.A.L.K.E.R.s, this assorted group carries a variety of weapons and upgrades, including gravitational weapons, telekinesis, telepathy, and grenade launchers. Drive lorries, cars, and jeeps as you explore the expansive world of creatures and changing weather. You enter this zone hoping to make your fortune, but you'll soon realize that your role is to discover what really happened in Chernobyl all those years ago.
